price: Enti nnipa dwen sε yεbɛgyae wͻn sε, wͻn aka sε: Yɛagye adi, wͻ aberε a yεnsͻ wͻn nhwε?
arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتۡرَكُوٓاْ أَن يَقُولُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفۡتَنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: aḥasiba al-nāsu an yut'rakū an yaqūlū āmannā wahum lā yuf'tanūna
